wikipedia_page.main: John Cecil Pearson (14 March 1896 – December 1979) was an English professional footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Burnley, Brentford and Grimsby Town.

response: * John Pearson (VC) (1825–1892), recipient of the Victoria Cross
